page.title: 07Population
page.content: Cardross has a population of approximately 2000 people. They either live in the village or the surrounding countryside. Cardross Primary School at present has a role of over 200 children but there are 700 children of school age or under. Until 20 years ago there was little movement in the population but in more recent years a large number of new houses have been built, bringing many young families into the area. Cardross has a floating population. People move into the area then go away after staying a few years, often because the father changes his employment. There are still some people in Cardross who have lived there all their lives, a few of them being well over 80 years of age.
